name: Edmar Meuwissen Consultancy
goal: Consultant to EUMEPS, the European Manufacturers Association of EPS insulation and EPS Packaging, which represents the interests of all major EPS producers throughout Europe. EMC conducts scientific research into the fields of energy efficiency in buildings, sustainable construction and packaging to contribute to the European debate on behalf of the members.EMC is active at EU level to advocate the benefits of energy efficiency in buildings and also works at international level to help set-up an effective framework for recycling of EPS foam and to exchange information on the benefits of energy efficiency of buildings.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: all insulation and packaging related EU initiatives, Plastics Strategy, CEN TC/88, CEN TC/127, CEN TC/350, CEN TC/351
